name: Action RPG AI in Unreal Engine 5 (Bachelor Thesis)
name_original: Action RPG AI in Unreal Engine 5 (Bachelor Thesis)
description:
Demo for Action RPG Combat system.

Your Feedback would be appreciated: Google Forms

Made in Unreal Engine 5.

First AI is a loop-based design.

Behavior Trees power the second AI.

Player and AI used the same class.
